DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate whether subject respond similarly Onset Effect Questionnaire ( OEQ ) administer pre-dose versus post-dose , receive SYMBICORT® pMDI 80/4.5 μg x 2 actuation twice daily budesonide HFA pMDI 80 μg x 2 actuation twice daily .
DOC.brief_title: A Two-week Study Assessing Onset Effect Questionnaire Administered Pre-dose Versus Post-dose Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male Female , > 18 year age Mild moderate asthma require treatment inhale corticosteroid Diagnosis asthma least 6 month Subjects require treatment systemic corticosteroid ( e.g. , oral , parenteral , ocular ) Subjects severe asthma , judge investigator Any significant disease disorder may jeopardize subject 's safety
